divs: Sighting DetailsLaying in my parents bed they have high rise ceilings and large glass windows I have a small child I was up with at 2 once he started falling asleep I was laying here watching what I thought was a plane until It did nit keep going it came back, went upslowly went down moved weird I kept watching it for some reason I was trying to make an explanation... I watched it fir about 35 min and it was going high over my house. I lost track of it freaked out and tried to go to sleep, it's scaring me so I am trying to find ways to make me feel better I tried to record it with my I touch but it would not pick up that small of light in the dark
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Placerville
There were no other sightings in Placerville on or around August 22nd 2011
Summary: I did not want to believe it continued to stare. Freaked out by this, I don't want people to think I'm crazy
